articles.title: Coeur d'Alene residents disappointed over cancelation of holiday light show - KXLY Spokane
articles.description: Every year, thousands of people comes to the holiday lighting celebration in downtown Coeur d'Alene to kickoff the holiday season. Sadly this will not be one of those years.

articles.title: Police investigating fatal shooting on West Main in Fort Wayne - WANE
articles.description: FORT WAYNE, Ind. (WANE) — Police were called to a shooting inside an all-age entertainment venue on West Main Street around 10:15 p.m. Friday night. Police on the scene say an adult male was killed. The victim was found in critical condition on the floor. Med…
